definition.text: How about shaping the time machine to the exact aspect ratio of your screen?

paragraphs.text: Matching the aspect ratio of your time machines to the aspect ratio of your screen is crucial for charts to fit your screen tightly!
Point your mouse at one of the time machines and hit Ctrl + Shift + Key-A. Do the same with the other one!
Leave the two time machines matching the aspect ratio of your screen. from now on!
